thread.section_title: Laguna Pearl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Laguna Pearl | lagunapearl.com
thread.title: Marion-NY

author: Marion-NY
title: Marion-NY
text: The whole experience was as I had expected. The earrings I chose after studying how to select a pearl was very educational and very much appreciated. Thank you Laguna Pearl for sharing your knowledge. The earrings arrived as tracking information stated but most of all the pearl earrings are beautiful, beyond expectation and I can say that "I am a very satisfied customer"!
